participatesInCycle.description: Wether the project participates in a circular dependency.

numberOfCommits.description: The total number of commits in the project in the last 30 days.

totalLinesOfCode.description: The total number of lines of code in the project.

htmlLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of HTML code in the project.

jsLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of JavaScript code in the project.

tsLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of TypeScript code in the project.

cssLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of CSS code in the project.

jsonLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of JSON code in the project.

mdLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of Markdown code in the project.

tsxLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of TypeScript JSX code in the project.

jsxLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of JavaScript JSX code in the project.

scssLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of SCSS code in the project.

lessLinesOfCode.description: The number of lines of LESS code in the project.

numberOfFiles.description: The total number of files in the project.
